author: Staff Reporter
text:
Temple festival ends

The 10-day Maasi festival of Mandaicaud Bhagavathy Amman Temple ended with ‘odukku puja, which was performed on the midnight of Tuesday.

The presiding deity was taken on a procession on a decorated elephant. A large number of women took part in the festival and prepared sweet pongal.

Twenty one varieties of food were brought from Sastha Temple in nine earthen pots by the priests. Even as the food items were offered to the deity with a special puja, the flag was brought down to mark the end of the Maasi festival The district administration had declared a holiday for the festival.
title: 10-day temple festival ends
